resources.string: To let you use the application offline, we will now download the actual information. Please ensure that you have Internet connection available and press Download to begin.
Failed to download data. Please ensure that your Internet connection is OK and try again.

This application was developed by TheNewPush, LLC. 
Main developer: Zoltán Adamek

We use a third-party service, Page My Doctor, so you can page the on-call provider with an urgent question after hours. First time users will register first. It’s simple! Please be brief and specific. Pagers and cell phones won’t take long messages easily.
